result.execSummary:
The defendant Joel R. Young was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Conditions: 

No contact with Stacy Young. 

Def is to engage in, pay for and successfully complete any counseling or education programs as recommended by agent. 

Def is to submit a DNA sample but surcharge is waived. 

Court orders no costs as part of the plea agreement (including the domestic abuse surcharge).

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Joel R. Young in court with attorney Dominic J. Anderson. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Plea questrionnaire/waiver of rights presented. NC plea entered. Colloquy. Finding of guilty.  Comment re. sentencing. 

Sentencing: withhold sentence for 12 months probation. Conditions: No contact with Stacy Young. Def is to engage in, pay for and successfully complete any counseling or education programs as recommended by agent. Def is to submit a DNA sample but surcharge is waived. Court is ordering no costs as that was part of the plea agreement (including the domestic abuse surcharge)

Defendant Joel R. Young in court with attorney Dominic J. Anderson. Prosecuting Atty Amy Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Further status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant's Motion to Extend Time to File Pretrial Motions

Defendant Joel R. Young in court with attorney Dominic J. Anderson. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  This is Atty. A's first appearance in this matter.  Def was previously informed of max penalties; now pleads NG.  Status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Joel R. Young in court. Prosecuting Atty Amy Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Def just received his copy of the complaint. Court informs def of the charges/max possible penalties and right to counsel. Court instructs def to contact SPD and otherwise attempt to retain counsel.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 15, 2015 at 09:00 am.
